name: Three Below
description:
Overview

Three below is a 2D puzzle game I created for a game jam hosted by the SGDA club at University of Texas at Dallas. The theme is "Rule of 3" and all contestants have 1 week to finish their game. The player's job is to escape.

We're underground. How long have we been here...? We were told that if any of us lost the game on the computer 3 times, we would all lose our chance to escape forever... No one has touched it since we got here, but today is the day. We are going crazy down here and at this point we decided it's all or nothing. We have to try to escape, today.

Controls

Mouse + Keyboard only.

Use WASD to move and E to interact with objects.

Credits

Programming/Art/Music/Sound - Hayden Roses (@rozeface)

Character sprites and animations obtained from http://gaurav.munjal.us/Universal-LPC-Spritesheet-Character-Generator/

Free sound samples obtained from https://freesound.org/ & https://www.bfxr.net/

Tools/Programs
  • Unity - Game Engine
  • Bosca Ceoil - Music
  • Piskel App - Art
If you get stuck and would simply like to see the game's progression, press "L" while playing the minigame on the computer. This will skip the level and bring you to the next phase. (Strongly recommend against this unless stuck and can't beat the levels).
